languages.text: "Налей и мне похлебки. Пусть слуги видят, что любая пища — великое благо!"
"Give me some of that soup. Let my servants see that any food is a great blessing!"
languages.original_text: "Налей и мне похлебки. Пусть слуги видят, что любая пища — великое благо!"

traits.locale_text: "Pour me some of that soup too. Let the servants see that any food is a great blessing!"
"Pour me some of that soup too. Let the servants see that any food is a great blessing!"
"Give me some of that soup. Let the servants see that any food is a great blessing!"
"Give me some of that soup. Let the servants see that any food is a great blessing!"
"Give me some of that soup. Let my servants see that any food is a great blessing!"
"Give me some of that soup. Let my servants see that any food is a great blessing!"

languages.text: «Deme un poco de sopa. ¡Que mis sirvientes vean que toda comida es una bendición!».
languages.original_text: "Give me some of that soup. Let my servants see that any food is a great blessing!"

traits.locale_text: «Deme un poco de sopa. ¡Que mis sirvientes vean que toda comida es una bendición!».

languages.text: 「そのスープを少しくれないか。どんな食べ物であっても大いなる恵みであることを、従者たちにわからせてやりたいのだ！」
languages.original_text: "Give me some of that soup. Let my servants see that any food is a great blessing!"

traits.locale_text: 「そのスープを少しくれないか。どんな食べ物であっても大いなる恵みであることを、従者たちにわからせてやりたいのだ！」

languages.text: “给我来碗汤。我要让所有仆从都看到：无论是什么食物，都是神皇的恩赐！”
languages.original_text: "Give me some of that soup. Let my servants see that any food is a great blessing!"

traits.locale_text: “给我来碗汤。我要让所有仆从都看到：无论是什么食物，都是神皇的恩赐！”

languages.text: "Gebt mir von der Suppe. Meine Diener sollen sehen, dass jede Nahrung ein großer Segen ist!"
languages.original_text: "Give me some of that soup. Let my servants see that any food is a great blessing!"

traits.locale_text: "Gebt mir von der Suppe. Meine Diener sollen sehen, dass jede Nahrung ein großer Segen ist!"

languages.text: « Donnez-moi donc un peu de cette soupe. Que mes serviteurs voient que toute nourriture est une bénédiction ! »
languages.original_text: "Give me some of that soup. Let my servants see that any food is a great blessing!"

traits.locale_text: « Donnez-moi donc un peu de cette soupe. Que mes serviteurs voient que toute nourriture est une bénédiction ! »

languages.text: "Bana şu çorbadan biraz ver. Hizmetkârlarım, her türden yemeğin büyük bir lütuf olduğunu görsünler!"
languages.original_text: "Give me some of that soup. Let my servants see that any food is a great blessing!"
